title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + IRE 2015, Philadelphia, June 4-7: Backgrounding an individual in a hurry
description: A guide to quickly uncovering information about an individual by using various resources and techniques, including social media accounts, court records, search engine tricks, and more.
